attributes.action: cancel the Commons request to investigate the whistleblower who leaked the details of MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is unanimous agreement within the population of the UK that the expense claims made by MP's from ALL parties are a disgrace, and we are extremely pleased to have been able to receive this information.

After all, it's OUR money you are spending, and we have a right to see how you spend it, so instead of creating a smokescreen, deal with the REAL issue, after all, as you say "If you've nothing to hide, you've nothing to fear", and "no if's no buts"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
